name: Too Close?
description:
"Too  Close?"

Yeah probably; I mean this is being written only a few minutes before the entered Game Jam's deadline.

Too Close is a small top-down shooter styled game,  your goal is to get the highscore, just like any other arcade game out there. Simple, right?

So, how about we raise the difficulty?

No shooting... So it's not really a shooter anymore, unless you consider the enemies shooting at you.

But, it's still simple really. Just survive and don't touch the red... 

and even the walls...

Maybe you can fool the terribly made AI? Who knows?

By the end you will probably be thinking that was "Too Close! I almost got hit!"

...or after playing it you could be thinking "Too Close! I almost didn't get this game"...
